lead_paragraph: MEYERS--Donald I.,M.D. The Columbia University Center for Psychoanalytic Training and Research and the Association for Psychoanalytic Medicine mourn the loss of our beloved Donald Meyers, M.D. Clinical professor and training analyst, he contributed to theory, to technique, to our organizations and to our personal growth as a loving friend and mentor. Eric R. Marcus, M.D. Director, CU Psychoanalytic Center Edith Cooper, Ph.D., President, APM 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MEYERS, DONALD I.

Eric R. Marcus, M.D. Director, CU Psychoanalytic Center Edith Cooper, Ph.D., President, APM 1/3
